body_html: Having faster memcpy in TF also could be later worked into open-source distributed TensorFlow. Right now sending messages locally in Open-Source distributed TF is done at speed of single-threaded memcpy, so TF process can't take advantage of faster network cards (ie, AWS instances have 25 Gbps)
body_text: Having faster memcpy in TF also could be later worked into open-source distributed TensorFlow. body: Having faster memcpy in TF also could be later worked into open-source distributed TensorFlow. Right now sending messages locally in Open-Source distributed TF is done at speed of single-threaded memcpy, so TF process can't take advantage of faster network cards (ie, AWS instances have 25 Gbps)
